com.link_intersystems.util

Class Loop

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.link_intersystems.util.Loop

  • public class Loop
extends Object
    A configurable implementation of a loop that can be used in main methods in order to execute a specific task for a number of times. E.g. like the command line util ping does.
    Author:
    Ren√© Link <rene.link@link-intersystems.com>
